content.rendered:
Directed by Trivikram Srinivas

Written by Trivikram Srinivas

Cast Allu Arjun (Bantu). Pooja Hegde (Amulya ‘Ammu’). Tabu (Yasoda ‘Yasu’). Jayaram (Ramachandra). Sushanth (Raj Manohar). Murali Sharma (Valmiki (as Murli Sharma)). Nivetha Pethuraj (Nandini ‘Nandu’). Navdeep (Sekhar). Sachin Khedekar (Ananth Ramakrishna ‘ARK’). Samuthirakani (Appala Naidu). Sunil (Sitaram (as Suneel)). Govind Padmasoorya (Paidithalli). Rajendra Prasad (Prajapati). Rahul Ramakrishna (Ravinder Reddy). Rohini (Valmiki’s wife). Easwari Rao (Sulochana). Vennela Kishore (Shrinivas). Tanikella Bharani (Anjaneya Prasad). Ajay (Satyam). Hyper Aadi (Port Worker). Brahmaji (Sudharshanam). Chammak Chandra (Chittila Murthy). Vaishnavi Chaitanya (Bantu’s foster sister). Brahmanandam (Special Appearance).Ananth. Rajiv Kumar Aneja (Board Member (as Rajiv Kumar A.)). Backagaindancer (Rampa). Joy Badlani (Mahmadullah). Ragini Dev (Ramuloo Ramulaa Dancer). Harshavardhan (Kasiram).Md Ariful Islam. Mirchi Kiran (Subrahmanyam). Jayanth Kumar (Jayanth). Md. Motalib Mondal (Biker (credit only)). Kalyani Natarajan (Nandini’s mother (as Kalyani N.)). Manik Reddy. Pammi Sai. Rahim Sarowar Shuvo (Kannsh). Sirisha Sougandh (Amulya’s mother). Narsing Yadav

Languages Telugu

Producers Allu Aravind. Ayan. Narravula Gopi Krishna. S. Radha Krishna. P.D.V. Prasad. Jonty Singh Rawat. Suryadevara Naga Vamsi

Production Geetha Art. Haarika & Hassine Creation
